channel.title: Need Help With No-Ip!
channel.description:
Ive read all tutorials..Ive set up no-ip account,downloaded no-ip DUC logged on an checked my servers ..ive also port forwarded...43594 on my router dlink 302gv2 ....well newaes when i give my server ip out to ppl it doesnt let them join my server..
ps:*its not my source i think as ive been hosting on hamachi but not many ppl join on hamachi servers so i want to change to no-ip*

item.title: Need Help With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @runeh4ck runeh4ck
item.description:
@runeh4ck wrote:

forget wut he said listen to wut im saying u need a DNS from no-ip.org im pretty sure u can find a no ip tut somewhere on the forums

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @Nz-Pker Nz-Pker
item.description:
@Nz-Pker wrote:

Umm how do i find out if i have a non-static ip

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @runeh4ck runeh4ck
item.description:
@runeh4ck wrote:

Get a no-ip DNS and portfowared to 43594 or whatever port your source runs on then, try to get ppl on it without having to use stupid hamatchi

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Is your firewall on?
Do you have a non-static IP?
Does your compiler work fine?

Any of these and many other solutions may disallow people to connect.

Try fixing them.

Read full topic
